item.title: 【一口口用心品嚐演算法30天系列】Day5 -- Brute Force - Insertion Sort
item.description: 前言 一連講了四天的背景知識，今天我們終於要來開始上主菜了，而主菜也是有很多的類別： Brute Force Decrease and Conquer Divide and Conquer Transform and Conquer Time and Space Tradeoffs Dynamic Programming Greedy Techniques 在我們這30天的系列

item.title: 【舌尖上的演算法】Day1 -- 初嚐演算法
item.description: 前言 從生物科技產業轉行到資訊科技產業不知不覺來到第五個年頭，這五年裡當個無憂無慮的小小碼農渾渾噩噩地來到了今天，雖然內心一直覺得既然踏入了這

item.title: A Brief Introduction of Using Java Logger
item.description: Recently, I am asked to record some information about how my server runs. So, I decide to use java.util.logging.Logger to implement the logging process. Also this article will give you a sample code of how to use the basic function of java.util.logging.Logger.

item.title: A Combination of TimerTask and Timer
item.description: In this article, I will give you a brief introduction about what Timer and TimerTask are and then a simple example to help you understand how to use them.
